<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Good morning</strong>. Our office in lower Manhattan stands less than a mile from where the World Trade Center towers fell 18 years ago today. You can still feel their presence in this neighborhood. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><img src="https://emojipedia-us.s3.dualstack.us-west-1.amazonaws.com/thumbs/120/apple/198/flag-for-united-states_1f1fa-1f1f8.png" class="img-responsive" width="18" style="width:100% !important;max-width: 18px;" alt=""> We remember the victims, send our warmest thoughts to their families, and thank the first responders who risked their lives to keep us safe that day and every day.</p>

<div class="c6 " style="margin-bottom:7px">
<!-- <![endif]-->
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
ECONOMY
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2019/09/10/not-whole-lot-concensus-economy?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
Not a Whole Lot of ConCensus About the Economy
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<img alt="Not a Whole Lot of ConCensus About the Economy" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiIxNTY4MTQ5Njg3LmpwZyIsImJ1Y2tldCI6Im1vcm5pbmdicmV3LW9zbG8iLCJlZGl0cyI6eyJyZXNpemUiOnsid2lkdGgiOjEwMDAsImhlaWdodCI6bnVsbH19fQ==">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>Francis Scialabba</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">The U.S. economy <a href="https://www.cbsnews.com/news/us-census-data-median-income-for-americans-was-flat-last-year-despite-economic-growth/?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">got its 2018 report card</a> from the Census Bureau yesterday. The message? Something like when your boss says, “Love your energy, but I see some opportunities for growth.” </p>
<h2 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0">For the glass-half-full types…</h2>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>The U.S. poverty rate fell to 11.8%, its lowest level since 2001 and the first time in 11 years it’s significantly ducked under the 2007 rate. While 38.1 million people still live below the federal poverty line, it looks like we’ve put the Great Recession behind us. </span></li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>Median household income surpassed $63,000/year for the first time, although </span><span><a href="https://www.latimes.com/world-nation/story/2019-09-10/poverty-rate-drops-but-uninsured-rate-takes-turn-for-worse?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">some policy experts note</a></span><span> that if you adjust for inflation, median income isn't much higher than it was in 1999 or 2007.</span>
</li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>The number of people employed full-time and year-round rose 2.3 million from 2017. </span></li>
</ul>
<h2 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0">As for those who see things as half-empty...</h2>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">The Bureau’s Current Population Survey is viewed as the gold-standard portrait of health insurance in the U.S., and <a href="https://www.vox.com/policy-and-politics/2019/9/10/20858938/health-insurance-census-bureau-data-trump?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">it did not paint</a> a pretty picture. The survey said the number of people without health coverage rose to 27.5 million, or 8.5% of the population, in 2018. </p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>That’s up from 7.9% in 2017 and the first time that figure has increased annually since the passage of the Affordable Care Act in 2010. One of President Obama’s signature policies, the ACA added coverage options for poor and some middle-income people, which drove down the uninsured rate. </span></li>
</ul>
<h2 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0">What happened?</h2>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Experts <a href="https://beta.washingtonpost.com/business/2019/09/10/us-poverty-rate-fell-lowest-since-while-uninsured-rate-rose-census-says/?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">consulted by the WaPo</a> point to… </p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>The Trump administration imposing limits on safety net programs like Medicaid for immigrants. </span></li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>States cracking down on eligibility and work requirements. </span></li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Bottom line: </strong>This B- report means both the Trump administration and its opponents will use the data as evidence of success or failure of the economy. </p>

<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding-top: 12px;">
<a href="https://www.facebook.com/sharer/sharer.php?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.morningbrew.com%2Fdaily%2Fstories%2F2019%2F09%2F10%2Fnot-whole-lot-concensus-economy" target="_blank" rel="noopener" style="text-decoration: none;" class="">
<img alt="" style="display: inline-block; width: 25px" width="25" src="https://media.sailthru.com/5z8/1k4/4/2/5e865734bf6f7.jpg">
</a><span>  </span>
<a href="https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?text=Glass+half+full%2C+or+glass+half+empty%3F&url=https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2019/09/10/not-whole-lot-concensus-economy&via=MorningBrew" target="_blank" rel="noopener" style="text-decoration: none;" class="">

<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">

<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
TECH
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2019/09/10/wake-apple-event?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
Wake Up! The Apple Event Is Over
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<img alt="No Alt" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL21lZGl1bS9hc3NldC83MTA1L2FwcGxlX2lwaG9uZS0xMS1wcm9fdWx0cmEtd2lkZV8wOTEwMTlfYmlnX2pwZ19sYXJnZV9qcGcuanBnIiwiYnVja2V0Ijoib3Nsby1wcm9kdWN0aW9uIiwiZWRpdHMiOnsicmVzaXplIjp7IndpZHRoIjoxMDAwLCJoZWlnaHQiOm51bGx9fX0=">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>Apple</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">To summarize <a href="https://www.cnet.com/how-to/apple-event-2019-iphone-11-pro-apple-arcade-ipad-watch-2019-and-everything-announced/?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">yesterday’s Apple event</a>: If you can’t impress, at least don’t disappoint. Here’s what Tim Apple and his crew unveiled in Cupertino...</p>
<h2 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0">Services</h2>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">With smartphone sales declining, Apple’s (+1.18%) putting emphasis on its services division. In August, it launched a credit card with Goldman Sachs, and yesterday it released details on upcoming entertainment and gaming platforms: <strong style="color:#000"></strong></p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>
</span><span><strong style="color:#000">Apple TV+ </strong></span><span>launches Nov. 1 for $4.99/month, undercutting streaming rivals including Netflix ($8.99) and the upcoming Disney+ service ($6.99). </span>
</li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>
</span><span><strong style="color:#000">The Apple Arcade</strong></span><span> gaming service </span><span><a href="https://www.cnet.com/news/apple-arcade-will-launch-on-september-19-for-4-99-per-month/?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">launches Sept. 19</a></span><span> also for $4.99/month.</span>
</li>
</ul>
<h2 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0">But it’s called the iPhone event for a reason</h2>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Apple revealed three new iPhones: the 11, 11 Pro, and 11 Pro Max.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Most noticeable were the camera upgrades, including Night Mode and the ability to take multiple videos simultaneously. Unfortunately for Apple, the three-camera design has been thoroughly <a href="https://www.cnet.com/news/apple-iphone-11-memes-not-sold-on-this-fidget-spinner-look-or-slofies/?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">memed</a> for its resemblance to fidget spinners, as have the “<a href="https://www.cnet.com/news/apples-slofies-slo-mo-selfies-get-strong-early-reaction-nope/?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">slofies</a>” (slo-mo selfies).  </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Zoom out: </strong>The Arcade and Apple TV+ launches will show us how well the services pivot is working. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000"><em>Some Apple housekeeping...</em></strong><em>in Monday’s Breakroom quiz, we said the iPhone 7 Plus screen is bigger than the iPhone XS Max screen. That was incorrect and we regret the error.</em></p>

<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
E-COMMERCE
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2019/09/10/jack-ma-goes-top?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
Ma Moonwalks Into Retirement
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>

<!--[if mso]>
<img alt="Ma Moonwalks Into Retirement" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" height=377 src="https://media.giphy.com/media/UUtkADNXZTggbXJaqs/giphy.gif">
<![endif]-->
<!--[if !mso]>--><!-- -->
<img class="story-header-image" alt="Ma Moonwalks Into Retirement" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" src="https://media.giphy.com/media/UUtkADNXZTggbXJaqs/giphy.gif">
<!--<![endif]-->
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>Giphy</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Jack Ma <a href="https://www.reuters.com/article/us-alibaba-jackma/tearful-ma-bids-alibaba-farewell-with-rock-star-show-idUSKCN1VU0VY?feedType=RSS&feedName=technologyNews&utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">retired</a> as chairman of Alibaba the only way Jack Ma knows how: with a four-hour rock show in an Olympic stadium.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">In the last 20 years, Alibaba’s matured into a $460+ billion juggernaut with footprints in artificial intelligence, financial services, and cloud computing. It's helped Ma, a former English teacher who co-founded the company, reach <a href="https://fortune.com/2019/09/10/jack-ma-net-worth-alibaba-retirement-billionaires/?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">$41.8 billion</a> in net worth and elevated him to the highest ranks of China's Communist Party.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Ma is handing chairmanship of the world's largest e-commerce group to CEO Daniel Zhang, so that Ma can <a href="https://www.cnn.com/2019/09/09/tech/jack-ma-retire-alibaba/index.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">focus on</a> initiatives including rural education, philanthropy, and women's empowerment. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">He’s not going far. </strong>Ma is <a href="https://www.nytimes.com/2019/09/10/business/alibaba-jack-ma-retire.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">sticking around</a> as a lifetime member of Alibaba Partnership (an influential group of management partners) and retaining a 6.2% share. He'll be #1 on Zhang's speed dial as Alibaba <a href="http://navigates?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">grapples with</a> competition from other tech companies and slowing Chinese and global economies. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">+ A “Ma”ntage of Jack’s greatest hits...</strong></p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>
</span><span><a href="https://morningbrew.cmail20.com/t/j-l-nulhtud-yduinykf-ii/?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">Dancing</a></span><span> at Alibaba's "Annual Party."</span>
</li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>
</span><span><a href="https://morningbrew.cmail20.com/t/j-l-nulhtud-yduinykf-id/?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">Singing tunes from <em>The Lion King</em></a></span><span> to employees.</span>
</li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>
</span><span><a href="https://morningbrew.cmail20.com/t/j-l-nulhtud-yduinykf-ih/?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">An interview with Andrew R. Sorkin</a></span><span> about the future of online trade and globalization.</span>
</li>
</ul>

<!-- <![endif]-->
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
FOOD
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2019/09/10/mcdonalds-announced-third-tech-deal-year?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
McDonald’s Would Like Robots With That
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<img alt="No Alt" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL21lZGl1bS9hc3NldC83MTAzLzEyMDBweC1tY2RvbmFsZF8yN3NfbG9nb190YXJnX2MzX2Izd2VrX2pwZy5KUEciLCJidWNrZXQiOiJvc2xvLXByb2R1Y3Rpb24iLCJlZGl0cyI6eyJyZXNpemUiOnsid2lkdGgiOjEwMDAsImhlaWdodCI6bnVsbH19fQ==">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>Crusier, McDonald's logo Targówek, CC BY-SA 3.0</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">McDonald’s announced its third tech deal of the year yesterday when it <a href="https://www.cnbc.com/2019/09/10/mcdonalds-acquires-ai-company-trying-to-automate-the-drive-thru.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">agreed to acquire</a> Apprente, a voice AI company McDonald’s hopes will make its drive-thru as smooth and convenient as a maple syrup delivery app. The financial terms weren’t disclosed.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Apprente’s tech directly translates speech to meaning, skipping the transcribing part that other “speech-to-text” AI relies on. McDonald’s has already been testing it in select restaurants, so...that may have been a robot taking your Filet-O-Fish order.  </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">McDonald’s Web Services may not be far off: </strong>McDonald’s is gunning to be the tech-savviest fast food spot in the strip mall. Earlier this year it spent a reported $300+ million <a href="https://www.cnbc.com/2019/04/03/mcdonalds-announced-2-deals-in-a-week-heres-why-investors-should-care.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">buying</a> Dynamic Yield, a personalized data startup.</p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>Apprente’s staff </span><span><a href="https://finance.yahoo.com/news/mc-donalds-buys-apprente-lets-you-order-big-macs-from-a-voiceoperated-drivethru-130039314.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">will be</a></span><span> the founding members of McD Tech Labs, a Silicon Valley-based group focused on innovation. First step: repairing the ice cream machines. </span>
</li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Bottom line:</strong> Wired <a href="https://www.wired.com/story/mcdonalds-acquires-apprente-voice-ai/?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">argues</a> this is a "defensive" move by McDonald’s, ensuring it gets access to key AI tech before Wendy’s and Burger King can get their hands on it.</p>

<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding-top: 12px;">
<a href="https://www.facebook.com/sharer/sharer.php?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.morningbrew.com%2Fdaily%2Fstories%2F2019%2F09%2F10%2Fmcdonalds-announced-third-tech-deal-year" target="_blank" rel="noopener" style="text-decoration: none;" class="">
<img alt="" style="display: inline-block; width: 25px" width="25" src="https://media.sailthru.com/5z8/1k4/4/2/5e865734bf6f7.jpg">
</a><span>  </span>
<a href="https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?text=McDonald%E2%80%99s+hopes+will+make+its+drive-thru+as+smooth+and+convenient+as+a+maple+syrup+delivery+app&url=https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2019/09/10/mcdonalds-announced-third-tech-deal-year&via=MorningBrew" target="_blank" rel="noopener" style="text-decoration: none;" class="">

<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">To be fair, it’s kind of hard to get a plane in the air when you have no one to fly it. Beginning on Monday, British Airways pilots <a href="https://www.cnn.com/2019/09/09/business/ba-british-airways-strike-intl-hnk/index.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">went on strike</a> for 48 hours over a pay dispute between the pilots union and the airline. It was the first pilots’ strike in BA history.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">The airline was forced to cancel nearly 1,700 flights, causing travel headaches for 195,000 passengers. <a href="https://www.ft.com/content/f8b35544-d3e6-11e9-8367-807ebd53ab77?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">More disruption</a> is expected today.</p>

collapse;\"\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003ctd style=\"padding:15px\"\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eThe U.S. economy \u003ca href=\"https://www.cbsnews.com/news/us-census-data-median-income-for-americans-was-flat-last-year-despite-economic-growth/?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003egot its 2018 report card\u003c/a\u003e from the Census Bureau yesterday. The message? Something like when your boss says, “Love your energy, but I see some opportunities for growth.” \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003ch2 style=\"font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0\"\u003eFor the glass-half-full types…\u003c/h2\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eThe U.S. poverty rate fell to 11.8%, its lowest level since 2001 and the first time in 11 years it’s significantly ducked under the 2007 rate. While 38.1 million people still live below the federal poverty line, it looks like we’ve put the Great Recession behind us. \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003eMedian household income surpassed $63,000/year for the first time, although \u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://www.latimes.com/world-nation/story/2019-09-10/poverty-rate-drops-but-uninsured-rate-takes-turn-for-worse?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003esome policy experts note\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e that if you adjust for inflation, median income isn't much higher than it was in 1999 or 2007.\u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eThe number of people employed full-time and year-round rose 2.3 million from 2017. \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003ch2 style=\"font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0\"\u003eAs for those who see things as half-empty...\u003c/h2\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eThe Bureau’s Current Population Survey is viewed as the gold-standard portrait of health insurance in the U.S., and \u003ca href=\"https://www.vox.com/policy-and-politics/2019/9/10/20858938/health-insurance-census-bureau-data-trump?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eit did not paint\u003c/a\u003e a pretty picture. The survey said the number of people without health coverage rose to 27.5 million, or 8.5% of the population, in 2018. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eThat’s up from 7.9% in 2017 and the first time that figure has increased annually since the passage of the Affordable Care Act in 2010. One of President Obama’s signature policies, the ACA added coverage options for poor and some middle-income people, which drove down the uninsured rate. \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003ch2 style=\"font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0\"\u003eWhat happened?\u003c/h2\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eExperts \u003ca href=\"https://beta.washingtonpost.com/business/2019/09/10/us-poverty-rate-fell-lowest-since-while-uninsured-rate-rose-census-says/?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003econsulted by the WaPo\u003c/a\u003e point to… \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eThe Trump administration imposing limits on safety net programs like Medicaid for immigrants. \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eStates cracking down on eligibility and work requirements. \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eBottom line: \u003c/strong\u003eThis B- report means both the Trump administration and its opponents will use the data as evidence of success or failure of the economy. \u003c/p\u003e\n\u003c!-- SOCIAL LINKS In August, it launched a credit card with Goldman Sachs, and yesterday it released details on upcoming entertainment and gaming platforms: \u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003e\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003e\n\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eApple TV+ \u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003elaunches Nov. 1 for $4.99/month, undercutting streaming rivals including Netflix ($8.99) and the upcoming Disney+ service ($6.99). \u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003e\n\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eThe Apple Arcade\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e gaming service \u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://www.cnet.com/news/apple-arcade-will-launch-on-september-19-for-4-99-per-month/?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003elaunches Sept. 19\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e also for $4.99/month.\u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003ch2 style=\"font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0\"\u003eBut it’s called the iPhone event for a reason\u003c/h2\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eApple revealed three new iPhones: the 11, 11 Pro, and 11 Pro Max.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eMost noticeable were the camera upgrades, including Night Mode and the ability to take multiple videos simultaneously. Unfortunately for Apple, the three-camera design has been thoroughly \u003ca href=\"https://www.cnet.com/news/apple-iphone-11-memes-not-sold-on-this-fidget-spinner-look-or-slofies/?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003ememed\u003c/a\u003e for its resemblance to fidget spinners, as have the “\u003ca href=\"https://www.cnet.com/news/apples-slofies-slo-mo-selfies-get-strong-early-reaction-nope/?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eslofies\u003c/a\u003e” (slo-mo selfies).  \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eZoom out: \u003c/strong\u003eThe Arcade and Apple TV+ launches will show us how well the services pivot is working. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003e\u003cem\u003eSome Apple housekeeping...\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/strong\u003e\u003cem\u003ein Monday’s Breakroom quiz, we said the iPhone 7 Plus screen is bigger than the iPhone XS Max screen. target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eretired\u003c/a\u003e as chairman of Alibaba the only way Jack Ma knows how: with a four-hour rock show in an Olympic stadium.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eIn the last 20 years, Alibaba’s matured into a $460+ billion juggernaut with footprints in artificial intelligence, financial services, and cloud computing. It's helped Ma, a former English teacher who co-founded the company, reach \u003ca href=\"https://fortune.com/2019/09/10/jack-ma-net-worth-alibaba-retirement-billionaires/?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003e$41.8 billion\u003c/a\u003e in net worth and elevated him to the highest ranks of China's Communist Party.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eMa is handing chairmanship of the world's largest e-commerce group to CEO Daniel Zhang, so that Ma can \u003ca href=\"https://www.cnn.com/2019/09/09/tech/jack-ma-retire-alibaba/index.html?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003efocus on\u003c/a\u003e initiatives including rural education, philanthropy, and women's empowerment. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eHe’s not going far. \u003c/strong\u003eMa is \u003ca href=\"https://www.nytimes.com/2019/09/10/business/alibaba-jack-ma-retire.html?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003esticking around\u003c/a\u003e as a lifetime member of Alibaba Partnership (an influential group of management partners) and retaining a 6.2% share. He'll be #1 on Zhang's speed dial as Alibaba \u003ca href=\"http://navigates?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003egrapples with\u003c/a\u003e competition from other tech companies and slowing Chinese and global economies. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003e+ A “Ma”ntage of Jack’s greatest hits...\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003e\n\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://morningbrew.cmail20.com/t/j-l-nulhtud-yduinykf-ii/?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eDancing\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e at Alibaba's \"Annual Party.\"\u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003e\n\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://morningbrew.cmail20.com/t/j-l-nulhtud-yduinykf-id/?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eSinging tunes from \u003cem\u003eThe Lion King\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e to employees.\u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003e\n\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://morningbrew.cmail20.com/t/j-l-nulhtud-yduinykf-ih/?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eAn interview with Andrew R. Sorkin\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e about the future of online trade and globalization.\u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\n\u003c!-- SOCIAL LINKS collapse;\"\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003ctd style=\"padding:15px\"\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eMcDonald’s announced its third tech deal of the year yesterday when it \u003ca href=\"https://www.cnbc.com/2019/09/10/mcdonalds-acquires-ai-company-trying-to-automate-the-drive-thru.html?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eagreed to acquire\u003c/a\u003e Apprente, a voice AI company McDonald’s hopes will make its drive-thru as smooth and convenient as a maple syrup delivery app. The financial terms weren’t disclosed.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eApprente’s tech directly translates speech to meaning, skipping the transcribing part that other “speech-to-text” AI relies on. McDonald’s has already been testing it in select restaurants, so...that may have been a robot taking your Filet-O-Fish order.  \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eMcDonald’s Web Services may not be far off: \u003c/strong\u003eMcDonald’s is gunning to be the tech-savviest fast food spot in the strip mall. Earlier this year it spent a reported $300+ million \u003ca href=\"https://www.cnbc.com/2019/04/03/mcdonalds-announced-2-deals-in-a-week-heres-why-investors-should-care.html?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003ebuying\u003c/a\u003e Dynamic Yield, a personalized data startup.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003eApprente’s staff \u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://finance.yahoo.com/news/mc-donalds-buys-apprente-lets-you-order-big-macs-from-a-voiceoperated-drivethru-130039314.html?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003ewill be\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e the founding members of McD Tech Labs, a Silicon Valley-based group focused on innovation.
